name: @umbraco-ui/uui-breadcrumbs
description: This package contains two web components - uui-breadcrumb-item and uui-breadcrumbs. They can be used as an additional navigation to allow users to keep track and maintain awareness of their location.

scripts.build: npm run analyze && tsc --build --force && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.clean: tsc --build --clean && rimraf dist lib/*.js lib/**/*.js custom-elements.json
